title: Supreme Court Opens Term With Look at Kansas’ Effort to Bar Insanity Defense
text:
WASHINGTON—The Supreme Court opened its term Monday with arguments exploring fundamental questions of criminal law, hearing separate cases asking whether the Constitution permits states to abolish the insanity defense or convict defendants absent a unanimous jury.
